Title: D.N.A.
Plot: A "friendly" date between Tommy and the widow of his dead cousin takes a unexpected turn when she makes a move on Tommy. Franco's ex-girlfriend shows up at the firehouse and claims he's the father of her five-year-old daughter, turning his life upside down.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Patricia Velasquez,  Susan A. Ashton,  Johnathan Tchaikovsky,  Jill Latiano,  Lisa Barnes,  Zoe Alexander,  Jarah,  Mackenzie Connolly,  Sanjiv Jhaveri,  Lethia Nall,  Jessica O'Donahue,  Rebecca O'Donahue,  Con
